title: UPDATE: They Want Sweet Revenge On This Serial Cheater
description:
Cheater, cheater, pumpkin eater! What do you do if you find out that the person you’re in a relationship with has been cheating on you with four other people?
She met Shmeve through a trusted friend, so she only expected great things from him. They only dated for two months before he suddenly broke up with her. His excuse: “Your kids are just too much for me.”
Before the breakup, she noticed a few red flags that set off a light bulb in her mind. He had been getting text messages during all times of the day and night and never left his phone unattended. She’s going through her “red flags are really green flags” phase, so she ignored it.
A woman messaged her a few days after the breakup with some bad news. She tells her that she had been dating Shmeve for well over six months. She lives a few hours away and the last time he had come to see her he had used her phone to log into his Facebook account and that she still had his password.
She told our listener that she found three other women Shmeve had been dating and one woman he’s currently engaged to—all in different states. But it doesn’t stop there. He has a type! There were dozens of women, specifically “single moms who are a little chunky”, all over the country that he had been messaging.
So, they devise a plan, and the woman that messaged her is still maintaining her relationship with Shmeve to gather information. They knew that he would be going hunting with his brother. They know how much Shmeve loves his truck and are thinking they want to make him pay for the hurt he caused by hurting his truck.
